org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Class DelimitedColumnEventFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text.DelimitedColumnEventFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventFormat

    public final class DelimitedColumnEventFormat
extends Object
implements EventFormat, Serializable

    Read events from delimited columns (CSV, TSV, etc.).

    Since:
    2.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • newContext

        public Object newContext()
        Description copied from interface: EventFormat

        Create a new context that may speed up parsing. This will be passed to EventFormat.parse(String, Object); will usually be a builder to be reused.

        The context will only ever be used from one thread.

        Specified by:
        newContext in interface EventFormat
        Returns:
        The context.
